_sText: This is basically the same map as little_italy_v3, except some adjustments for unlimited ammo servers: I removed several tube-like camping spots. So if you think the standard _v3 is too hard for the zombies you can try out this version. I didn't weaken all the other camping spots though. [Gameplay] Very fast and action-packed, throughout balanced and alot of fun! - 64 spawn points (32 each) - High framerate - Tons of hiding places (enough for 64 players) [Design] - 3d skybox - Cubemaps - Detailed map - Thanks to komaokc for his amazing skybox texture! [Update History] -- v2 (21.03.2010) -- Removed the vending machine from the room with that one window, all other camping spots seem to be well balanced! -- v3 (24.03.2010) -- New skybox. (No other changes) -- v3_ZN2 (10.05.2010) -- Removed tube-like camping spots. Have fun! >> Click here to look for servers where this map is running! <<
